summary: Diff adds a new `useDashboardInside` hook that persists freeform text to a dedicated LocalStorage key (`dashboard-inside`) and wires it into `Dashboard.tsx` with editing state and a save handler. Placement/UI details for the actual "Inside" card (title text, Edit/Save/Cancel buttons, and responsive layout) are not fully verifiable from the truncated `Dashboard.tsx` diff, though `frontend-file-summaries.txt` asserts the section exists side-by-side with Quick Note on large screens.

hallucinated_features.description: Versioned JSON storage format for the Inside content (storing `{version, content}`) rather than a plain string.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 only requires LocalStorage persistence with a dedicated key; it does not request versioning or a structured payload.

hallucinated_features.description: Added `dashboard-inside` to a centralized LocalStorage key clearing utility list.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asked to update app-wide LocalStorage reset/registry utilities; only persistence for the new section was requested.
